name: The Magical Lamp of Aladdin
description:
Everyone knows the story of Aladdin – the classic adventure tale from 1001 Arabian Nights - and its heroes. A magic lamp. A wish-granting genie. A power-hungry villain magician. Welcome to Agrabah and to 1001 nights magical world.
We bring these images to life with an original soundtrack, illustrations and animation that makes children feel as if they are not just listening to the story narrative, but living it. They can explore the secret cave in search of the magic lamp, and escape with Genie’s help. They can visit the luxurious palace of the sultan, and the bustling market where Aladdin first sees Princess Jasmine. Most importantly, they can help Aladdin defeat the evil magician.
Woven throughout this classic fairy tale are interactive games and jigsaw puzzles that engage children and help develop their cognitive skills. They can learn a few magic tricks from the Genie, fly on the magic carpet, or help Princess Jasmine change her costume and play a tune.
With PonyApps’ The Magical Lamp of Aladdin interactive story, parents can transport their children not just to the magical world Agrabah, but also to instill in them the values they need in their own lives. As the children listen to the story, play games and put together puzzles, they follow along with the Aladdin, Djinni and Princess Jasmine; they engage in games designed to intrigue young readers and build kids skills and fantasy.
The beauty of The Magical Lamp of Aladdin lies not only in the messages it conveys to young listeners – that there is hope even in the most difficult situations, and that time heals all wounds – but in the interactive nature of every page.
With more than 60 unique illustrations, educational games and an original score, this classic rags to riches adventure app can entertain children at home, in the car, or on magical carpet flying all over Agrabah:)
Follow along with this classic bedtime story from 1001 Arabian Nights, and learn many new things to satisfy your curiosity. Learning is more fun with games and animations.
